\documentclass{article}

\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{textcomp}
\usepackage{courier-extra}
\usepackage{alltt}
\newcommand{\quickbrownfox}{The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.}

\begin{document}

\section{courier-extra-test}

\subsection{Computer Modern}

\begin{alltt}
\usefont{T1}{cmtt}{m}{n}\quickbrownfox{} : cmtt-m-n
\usefont{T1}{cmtt}{m}{sc}\quickbrownfox{} : cmtt-m-sc
\usefont{T1}{cmtt}{m}{sl}\quickbrownfox{} : cmtt-m-sl
\end{alltt}
